description: samurai wearing an orange mask and a green kimono engaged in intercourse with a young woman working in a rice field, wearing a red striped kimono and a wide-brimmed hat; couple at left, with man wearing short green and white patterning kimono and woman wearing blue kimono with white flowers and wide-brimmed hat; tiny man in blue and grey striped kimono smoking a pipe, in LRC; text in a cloud at top of image and in four areas along grey pathway behind figures
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Peasant Love, No. 6 from the book Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon), vol. 1
